title: Prime Time Wrestling: Sport or Drama, Two-Way Table
question_text:
Shane and Emma have been having a big disagreement. Although they both watch Prime Time Wrestling, Emma believes it is all drama - basically a soap opera for men! Shane says no way! "It's all sport" he claims.
In order to investigate whether gender influences opinions, Shane and Emma conducted a survey of several randomly selected individuals who watch Prime Time Wrestling. Respondents were asked to choose between the following three options concerning their beliefs.
$\bullet$ It's All Sport $\bullet$ It's All Drama $\bullet$ It's Part Sport, Part Drama
Responses was recorded separately for both men and women and are shown in the two-way table below.
Which of the following correctly identifies the explanatory and response variables in this study?
